L2_gloss: Suffix deriving words for female people from those for male people.
to bow, to stoop, to bend
to excrete, to defecate, Synonym: nya

to break off (a piece)
Synonym: qhetsola
to farm, to cultivate, to plough
skin, hide (of a human or animal)
yonder, over there; remote demonstrative adverb.
(vulgar) to excrete, to defecate, Synonym: kaka
skin spread on ground as bed

to break off (a piece)
Synonym: kgephola
to hold, to catch, to take
